points: 高中时曾简单翻译过一本英文书法教程(Palmer Method 1935)，发布于Cursive贴吧，喜欢字体以及其他手工艺作品。
个人博客如果无法访问，可以访问tomato3.coding.net，博客内容暂未开始更新，主要是想写一些「长半衰期」的文章，而不是像老太太裹脚布一样的技术备忘录。

description: Wrote a ruby gem _Morsel_ to traverse through active record trees to purge old records. It helped in limiting the production database size and keeping the data clean.
Finds relevant repositories based on an user's GitHub profile.
Written in Ruby on Sinatra and uses Github's Octokit gem

details.tagline: Convert JSON data to pretty resumes in .html, .tex, .md
description: Static personal page and resume design using Mustache.
Current resume is generated using json_resume.

frontEnd: 掌握 Javascript/HTML5/CSS3 ，能熟练使用原生 Javascript 开发应用
了解 jQuery/RequireJS 等库文件
了解 less/stylus/pug 预编译工具
了解 gulp/bower 构建工具
能够对前端页面进行性能优化
了解 简单安卓程序开发
了解 Progressive Web Application 技术
了解 git/linux 日常操作
others: CET-4, 可阅读英文技术教程。

items: 2016.07    2016伯乐相“码”大陆集团首届代码优化大赛 优秀奖
2014.07    全（重庆）市大学生“中华魂”读书活动征文比赛二等奖

items.title: Hexo主题-ambition
details: 其他的hexo主题自己不是很喜欢，所以就自己写了一个。使用了ServiceWorker增强离线体验，练习了stylus。可访问我的博客查看。

items.title: 嗨柚义工旅行官方网站
details: 使用jQuery/RequireJS完成网站开发。第一周，我负责切图，第二周参与交互逻辑的开发与调试，第三周结束时网站上线测试并调试api。第四周，将原本的PC端网站改为响应式网站。后续又在登录页添加QQ互联接口。

items.headline: Designed product _Omerta_, a multi-user chat room application in j2me using Sun Wireless Toolkit platform.
points: Was awarded 1<sup>st</sup> position for the product in [Envision](http://www.ecell-iitkgp.org/envision.php), Product Innovation Contest, IIT KGP.
Was awarded 1<sup>st</sup> position for the product in Javawise, J2ME s/w Development Contest at IIT Kharagpur, 2008 and 2009 continuously.
